overview: Francesca for the others, Thomas for himself, is a boy born in a female body that doesn’t feel anymore belonging to him. He has a date with a girl met online but things don’t go as planned. Thomas and his friends grew up in Barona spending their afternoons riding scooters. On a random day, among the buildings of the outskirts of Milan, Elisa, Thia Bomber’s girlfriend, notices Thomas for the first time. The screams, a party, a kiss: moments of a day that changes forever the life of the guy.
title: Paramore
